bullets.title: The Driver [The Entrepreneur]
bullets.subhead: We invest in drivers, not cars.
bullets.description: We will pick the driver regardless of what kind of car they drive. As long is it is a legal, moral and ethical business, - we are all in!

bullets.title: The Car [The Business]
bullets.description: If you put a great driver in an average car, you will get above average performance. A great driver will perform with any car, at any time, in any race.

bullets.title: The Race [The Market]
bullets.description: We can fix or suit up the car. We are not "Industry" focused we are "Driver" focused. Find the driver, fix him a car, and get him in the race.
